name: Space Battle (itch) (ThaCuber)
description:
You're a space bounty hunter which, after so much time of escaping the Spatial Law, they finally found you! You must survive for as long as possible before they finally catch you! Oh and there are skins :D

Space Battle: A game made for Fanweek 40 "Default Blocks".

I'm gonna be also posting most of my Fancade games in itch.io so be sure to keep up with them!
